::firestorm flys back to his underground base::

Firestorm-There is nothing we can do here.

::he goes inside and warms up the ships engines::

Firestorm-Computer before we leave leave a small starcruiser so the alliance 
can get out when they win

::the secuirity elements return to the inside of the ship::

Megaprime-Vapor shields activate

::the shields disintegrate the top of the cavern and the ship hovers up::

Firestorm-enitiate warp sequences

::power levels inside the engine rise::

Megaprime-50% and rising

Firestorm-We got three pods,ill launch 2 towards the alliance base and ill 
put 1 at the pole

Megaprime-90% and we have warp power

Firestorm-GO

::the ship leaves the cavern and goes through warp zone to cybertron,the 
small ship appears in the cavern and 3 stasis pods drop::

((i got TOO much to do,maybe in the summer ill rejoin))

((Note to Icedemon if you didnt launch those pods those are yours))
